decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing Enigmatic Incarnation to continuously tutor for powerful creatures and enchantments from your deck to control the board while generating value. The deck includes a variety of high-impact creatures like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Overlord of the Hauntwoods, along with key enchantments such as Leyline Binding and Chained to the Rocks. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion allows for additional flexibility and card advantage. By carefully managing your resources and utilizing Enigmatic Incarnation effectively, you can outvalue and outlast your opponents in a slower-paced, grindy matchup.

The deck focuses on using low-cost Spirit creatures with powerful abilities to apply pressure on the opponent quickly. It utilizes cards like Sheltered by Ghosts and Geistlight Snare to protect its creatures while controlling the board. The mana base includes cards like Hallowed Fountain and Seachrome Coast to ensure consistent mana production. Key cards like Spell Queller and Supreme Phantom provide additional disruption and power to the deck, while Mutavault and The Wandering Emperor offer versatility and additional threats. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive Spirit creatures while maintaining board control.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by using counterspells, removal spells, and card advantage to outlast opponents. The deck aims to slow down opponents by countering key spells with cards like Dovin's Veto and utilizing removal like Portable Hole and Field of Ruin to deal with threats. It also focuses on card advantage with spells like Memory Deluge and Deduce to stay ahead in the game. The deck has a strong late-game with cards like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and Settle the Wreckage to close out games.

The deck focuses on utilizing the companionship ability of Jegantha, the Wellspring to maximize the potential of the deck. It includes a mix of creatures that can be searched out with Collected Company, mana acceleration with Llanowar Elves and Elvish Mystic, and powerful legendary creatures like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Kinnan, Bonder Prodigy. The deck also features ways to protect and support its creatures, such as Relic of Legends and Honest Rutstein. The mana base includes lands that support the deck's strategy, such as Boseiju, Who Endures and Botanical Sanctum.

This deck focuses on quickly building up a single creature with multiple powerful Auras to create a highly aggressive threat. By attaching cards like All That Glitters, Ethereal Armor, and Curious Obsession to a creature like Gladecover Scout, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a massively buffed attacker. The inclusion of cards like Staggering Insight and Gryff's Boon also provide additional benefits while still keeping the pressure on the opponent. Jegantha, the Wellspring serves as a useful companion option to provide additional flexibility and consistency to the deck.
